}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "7016A0838008 Ver: 1.00" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Specifications are per the FCC EUT. "7016A0838018 Ver: 1.10" is silkscreened on the board in the users photos. :Ver.: v.2.0.361
<small> *Dual-Band 11ac Speeds to 1300Mbps on 5 GHz; to 450Mbps on 2.4 GHz *28dBm Transmit Power Offers Greater Range & Multi-Floor Penetration *Internal 5dBi Antenna Array Minimizes Interference for Reliable Connections *802.3at-Compliant Gigabit PoE Port Provides Expanded Deployment & Power Options </small>
